participant_1.background:
I practice yoga daily.
I am a vegan.
I have a marketing job.
I also meditate a lot.

participant_2.background:
Formal situations make me uncomfortable.
I have over 4000 friends on facebook.
I live alone.
I enjoy hitchhiking.

content.text: Hello, what do you do for fun?
I enjoy hitchhiking, it can be a really fun way to travel and meet new people.
That sounds interesting, I've never done it before. Do you have any tips for getting started?
Sure, the best way to get started is to just do it! There are lots of resources online that can help you learn how to hitchhike safely.
Thanks, I'll check those out. What's your favorite place to hitchhike to?
I love hitching to new places, but my favorite place to hitchhike to is the beach. There's something about being in the ocean that just makes me feel relaxed.
I can understand that, I love the beach too. Do you have any other hobbies?
I practice yoga daily, and I also meditate a lot. I find that these practices help me to stay calm and focused, which is important for my job as a marketing manager.
That's great, I'm glad you have found things that help you to relax. I'm a vegan, so I know a little about yoga. It's a great way to stay healthy and in shape.
I'm glad to hear that you're a vegan too! It's a great way to live a healthy life.
I agree, it's the best decision I've ever made.
I'm glad you're happy with it!
I am, and I'm glad I met you today.
Me too, it's been nice chatting with you.
